trustfund:
TF038767-REPUBLIC OF CONGO - PREPARATION
            - MULTISECTOR CAPACITY BUILDING PROJECT,TF053314-PHRD-CONGO(REPUBLIC OF):
            TRANSPARENCY AND GOVERNANCE CAPACITY BUILDING

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Transparency and
            Governance Capacity Building Project for Congo, Republic of
            were as follows: outcomes were moderately satisfactory; risk
            to development outcome was moderately satisfactory; Bank
            performance was moderately satisfactory and borrower
            performance was also moderately satisfactory. Some lessons
            learned includes: it is clear with hindsight that the
            original project design was excessively ambitious,
            attempting to impact distinct and unrelated areas of
            government policy and management. The implementation of the
            project rested on one project coordinating unit and close to
            thirty project executing agencies. This created a distinct
            implementation challenge since the institutional capacity
            for coordination was a weak point on the side of the
            borrower. The second phase featured recognition of the
            potential of the project to support a high priority agenda
            with political salience.
